content.subTitle: New beginnings
content.text: I'm born in Sweden & moved to the US in 2017 to build a life with my wonderful partner.

content.subTitle: Craving change
content.text: I started my programming journey in March 2024, after spending 6 years as a visual merchandiser career on a tight-knit team. Since then, I've dedicated 40+ hours a week to front & back-end development.

content.subTitle: Best of two worlds
content.text: What I love the most about programming is how it challenges both my creativity & logical thinking.

content.subTitle: User first
content.text: The most important thing to me is to ensure a seamless & inclusive user experience. I implement every application feature with the user's needs as the top priority.

content.subTitle: Scalable & clean
content.text: My ambition is to create a seamless & inclusive user experience by implementing every application feature with the user needs as the top priority.

content.subTitle: Never stop learning
content.text: Every project is a new opportunity to learn. I like going outside of my comfort zone - it keeps me motivated & helps me grow as a developer.

content.subTitle: Curious by nature
content.text: I love trying new things - whether it's tasting a dish for the first time, testing out a new JavaScript trick or randomly going on a daytrip to a place I've never been.

content.subTitle: Creative inspirations
content.text: I am & have always been a creative person, finding inspiration in nature, art, design & the occasional thought-provoking discussion. When I'm not coding I'll be sketching, reading books, taking pictures & skiing.
